text: Theres also an option of an API integration.  <https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/blogv2/post_blog_posts>

Hey everyone,

Is it possible to hide modules in the page creation tool based on a portal?
To give some context, I develop modules that are then deployed via the cli on two portals. (these modules can be used on both environments).

However, I have a module that must be present on one portal, what can I do to hide it on the other one?

Tell me if u don't understand my issue... ThanksÂ :slightly_smiling_face:
